title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education,
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science (Transfer of Departmental Administration and 
Ministerial Functions) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 21 October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited higher education research innovation science (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2020 (2) order come operation 21 october 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by this Order are 
transferred to the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Department of Education and Skills contained in any 
Act or any instrument made under such Act and relating to any administration 
and business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Department of Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred order transferred department higher education research innovation science (2) reference department education skill contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education and Skills -
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education and Skills - 

(a) by or under the Acts specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, and 

(b) under the Regulations specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are transferred to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Minister for Education and Skills contained in any Act 
or instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions transferred by 
paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 3 (1) function vested minister education skill - (a) act specified part 1 schedule (b) regulation specified part 2 schedule transferred minister higher education research innovation science (2) reference minister education skill contained act instrument made act relating function transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Education and Skills is a party 
and the proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 
the name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation 
and Science shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any functions transferred 
by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the Minister for 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [451] 3 

Education and Skills or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the 
proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.
text_norm: 4 immediately commencement order legal proceeding pending minister education skill party proceeding reference function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science name minister higher education research innovation science shall far proceeding relate function transferred order substituted proceeding minister notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 23rd october 2020 451 3 education skill added proceeding may appropriate proceeding shall abate reason substitution

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Education and Skills, may in so far as it 
relates to a function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, be carried on or completed 
on or after such commencement by the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister education skill may far relates function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science carried completed commencement minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and insofar as it 
was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have effect 
from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall insofar operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Education and Skills contained in the
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Education and Skills contained in the 
memorandum and articles of association of any company and relating to any 
function transferred by this Order shall, from the commencement of this Order, 
be construed as references to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 7 reference minister education skill contained memorandum article association company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), herby
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Education and Skills in 
connection with the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science 
and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on 
such commencement - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science by this Article 
which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of the 
Minister for Education and Skills shall, on the request of the Minister for Further 
and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation 
and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [451]
